title: DocsSAGRequest
description: Schema describing documentation drafting briefs consumed by DocsSAG.

id.description: Unique identifier for the documentation drafting task.

version.description: Contract version. Increment the minor version for backwards compatible changes.

doc_type.description: Type of document to generate (e.g., overview, runbook, sop, api_reference, release_notes, policy, other).

title.description: Document title rendered in the Markdown output.

summary.description: One paragraph summary capturing the intent of the document.

oneOf.description: Primary audience or stakeholder group for the document.

style_tone.description: Desired tone or style guidance (e.g., concise, tutorial, executive).

constraints.description: List of constraints or non-negotiables (e.g., terminology guardrails, deadlines).

references.description: Resource links, tickets, or documents that must be cited.

sections.description: Ordered sections to render in the output document.

knowledge_refs.description: IDs of knowledge cards that seed this section.

details.description: Optional paragraph of detailed content or context.

metadata.description: Additional structured metadata for automation use.
